title: A Child's Christmas in Wales by Dylan Thomas
brief_description: Using still photographs, this film shows life in Wales, illustrating Dylan Thomas’s recorded reading of his reminiscences about Christmas in his home country. Children play tricks on their elders, the adults enjoy the food and drink and even the local fire brigade becomes involved.
